title: Wayward Son
description: Collette Kindrick is running. On her anniversary, she caught her boyfriend sleeping with someone else. Heartbroken, she packs just enough to get by and runs to the city that never sleeps. A chance encounter brings her into Dominic's path and she falls head over heels for the biker. Dominic Davoli has had his life planned out since he was born. He is destined to be the next Wayward Saints president. Meeting Coley was never part of his plan, but, once he's had her, he can't let go.One wrong move lands Dom in jail, threatening everything he is trying to hold on to.Will their differences tear them apart, or will Dom claim Coley as his ole' lady and keep her in Vegas with him?
author: K. Renee
